content: this pattern is for a cotton placemat for a cute table setting each placemat uses just under one ball of paintbox aran cotton if your gauge is tight you might like to use a 6mm hook the pattern is crocheted in the round in a spiral fashion so you do not need to join each round the pattern requires use of a magic_ring to begin double crochets and single crochets a stitch marker is useful to keep track of the beginning of your round
